QuestData.Title: The Terrors of Iso'rath
QuestData.Description: We need you! You were stuck in some kind of nightmare. So are many of the other shaman.$B$BIt doesn't matter... our plan is falling apart. Some of our shaman are channeling protective auras that should combat the digestive juices and keep you alive, but we need you to rescue the other shaman from the tentacles. We won't be able to defeat Iso'rath without them!$B$BDon't stay out in the stomach without the other shaman for too long or you'll be digested alive!
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue Hargoth Dimblaze, Earthmender Duarn, Stormcaller Jalara, and Stormcaller Mylra.$B$BReturn to the safety of the other shaman if Iso'rath's defenses are eating away at you.
QuestData.CompletionText: The battle is not over. The shaman within Iso'rath need you!
QuestData.RewardText: United with the Earthen Ring, we can survive the horrors of Iso'rath. Now it is time to turn our vengeance upon him!
